text:
NAEB Headquarters
14 Gregory' Hall
Urb&na, Illinois
To 8
Froms
Dates
If you gentlemen and lady approve, I should like to distribute
to the membership ahead of the Convention the following itemsi
1) Copy of Kellogg Report with the careful editing I shall
give it to be sure that it meets the requirements of this
new distribution,
2) Copy of the report, of a similar nature, whioh I hop© to
have off to the FAE ty the middle of this month. This will
be the most comprehensive report we have presented to the
FAE,
3) The final fisoal report as sent Kellogg, however, deleting
details of the salary budget of individuals, and so forth,
leaving only general listings.
4) The fiscal report whioh we shall be providing you as of
the end of th© first quarter of the new fiscal year.
I would like very much to give all members so much information
ahead of this next Convention that there can b© no feeling that any¬
thing is being kept from them. I hope you will agree,
I also hope that you will be good enough to send Graydon and me
listings of all problems whioh should find themselves on the agenda
for the directors meeting, already announced. Harold and I are going
through old directors and Convention minutes to be sure that we don*t
miss anything, and will have tentative listing of the problems well
in advance of the final agenda.
MEB Board of Directors
Skorni.^ '
September 1, 1954
HJSsop
